name: BoldVoice
headline: Speech and accent coaching app for non-native English speakers
description: BoldVoice helps non-native English speakers to speak clearly and confidently. We combine bite-sized video lessons from Hollywood accent coaches with instant pronunciation feedback from AI, to create an effective and engaging learning experience.

founders.name: Anada Lakra, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder/CEO at BoldVoice, helping non-native English speakers to speak English clearly and confidently and advance their careers.

founders.name: Ilya Usorov, Founder
founders.description: Current: CTO @ BoldVoice, a speech and pronunciation coaching app to help non-native English speakers speak more clearly and confidently. We combine video instruction from Hollywood speech coaches together with speech AI tools.

# Speak English _clearly and confidently_
## Top Hollywood accent coaches and Artificial Intelligence to supercharge your communication
[Start your free week](https://boldvoice.com/<https:/start.boldvoice.com/join/name>)

### Speak and get ‍instant A.I. feedback
Just speak, and poof! ‚ú®
Our A.I. will score your pronunciation, and show you how you can improve.

### Learn from Top Hollywood accent coaches
They‚Äôve taught actors and celebrities, and now they‚Äôll teach you! üåü
The 5-minute videos will help you master all the tricky pronunciations of English.
### Unlimited practice = unlimited improvement
Words, sentences, conversations...
There are unlimited opportunities to practice and improve your speaking. üì£
![Demo of BoldVoice app; girl speaking into app on phone](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60fcddc4d806aae485f642fb/643ed9dd1d9b0fb6cf02ba34_Group%2031449.webp)

### Make progress in only 10 minutes a day
Each day, you get personalized videos and exercises, that only take 10 minutes.
All designed to give you noticeable results in a few months of short daily practice! üöÄ

generated_description:
**BoldVoice Overview**

BoldVoice is a New York-based startup, founded in 2021 and part of the Y Combinator Batch S21. The company specializes in speech and accent coaching for non-native English speakers. Its mission is straightforward: to help individuals speak clearly and confidently in English.

**What They Do**

The platform merges bite-sized video lessons from Hollywood accent coaches with cutting-edge AI for instant pronunciation feedback. The approach is designed to be not only effective but engaging. Each lesson is concise‚Äîaround five minutes long‚Äîallowing users to effectively practice their speaking skills without a significant time commitment. With just ten minutes of daily practice, users can make noticeable improvements in their accent and fluency.

**Current Initiatives and Features**

Recently, BoldVoice launched the "Accent Oracle" on Product Hunt, a tool that detects accents just by hearing a person speak. They encourage users to try the app with a free week, featuring personalized lessons tailored to various native languages and unlimited AI feedback.

Their app has garnered significant traction, boasting over 46,000 reviews on the App Store, with an impressive average rating of 4.8/5. Users from more than 150 countries have reported substantial improvements, especially in pronunciation and overall confidence while speaking.

**Leadership and Team**

BoldVoice operates with a small team of seven passionate employees. Michael Seibel, a prominent figure in the startup ecosystem, serves as their group partner. This small but dedicated team is focused on reshaping how non-native English speakers interact with the language.

**Why It Matters**

In an increasingly globalized world, effective communication is crucial. BoldVoice addresses a significant pain point for many: the challenge of being understood in a second language. Their innovative approach combines traditional coaching methods with technology, making it accessible and practical for users everywhere.

In essence, BoldVoice isn't just about teaching English; it's about empowering individuals to express themselves confidently and clearly. It‚Äôs a fascinating model that promises to change lives‚Äîone pronunciation at a time. 

For more information, you can check out their website: [BoldVoice](https://boldvoice.com).
